column1: {{adaptation}}
{{rewrite}}
{{expansion}}
This list contains all minor characters in [[Bree-land]] that were created specifically for [[The Lord of the Rings Online]].
==Aldred Cartwright==
'''Aldred Cartwright''' is the champion trainer in [[Archet]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column2: [[Bree-land Introduction]]</ref> In the [[Bree-land Introduction]] [[Amdir (Shadows of Angmar)|Amdir]] sends the champion  player to him so he can improve the player's skills.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column3: [[Bree-land Introduction|Introduction]]

column1: ==Ann Granger==
'''Ann Granger''' is a woman of [[Archet]] found near the Hunter's Lodge.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column2: [[Bree-land Introduction]]</ref> She originally held a farm in Archet-Dale but was driven out by [[Blackwolds]] and joined [[Jon Brackenbrook]]'s hunters.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]
column3: ''Stolen Treasures''</ref>

column1: ==Aran Greyfeather==
'''Aran Greyfeather''' is a bowyer from [[Archet]]. He sells his products west of Archet's trainings fields.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column2: [[Bree-land Introduction]]</ref>

column1: ==Argirion==
'''Argirion''' was the first mate at the [[Gilminuial]]
column2: a ship of the [[Rangers of the North|Rangers]] that supplies the [[Wardens of Annúminas]].<ref name="shipwrecked mariners">[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]
column3: ''The Tale of the Shipwrecked Mariners''</ref> When a storm destroyed the ship Argirion and [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Bree-land#Mindambeth|Mindambeth]]
column5: were drowned near [[Buckland]]. He asks you to follow the [[Baranduin]] to the north to find the drowned ship and to learn the fate of the other crew members
column6: especially of [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Evendim#Aranhir|Aranhir]]
column7: the captain of the Gilminuial.<ref name="shipwrecked mariners"/>

column1: ==Cal Sprigley==
'''Cal Sprigley''' is a farmer in southern [[Archet]]-Dale.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column2: [[Bree-land Introduction]]</ref> He successfully defended his farm against the [[Blackwolds]] but fled to Archet with his wife
column3: [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Bree-land#Holey Sprigley|Holey Sprigley]]
column4: when the spiders overrun his farm.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]
column5: ''Finding Reason</ref> He's a friend of [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Bree-land#Constable Thistlewool|Constable Thistlewool]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]

column1: ==Constable Thistlewool==
'''Constable Thistlewool''' is the constable of [[Archet]] and can be found at its training grounds.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column2: [[Bree-land Introduction]]</ref> He's a friend of [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Bree-land#Cal Sprigley|Cal Sprigley]]
column3: a farmer in the south of Archet-Dale.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]

column1: ==Cuthbert Rook==
'''Cuthbert Rook''' is a lore-master trainer of [[Archet]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column2: [[Bree-land Introduction]]</ref> In the [[Bree-land Introduction]] he improves the player's skills on [[Amdir (Shadows of Angmar)|Amdir]]'s request.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column3: [[Bree-land Introduction|Introduction]]

column1: ==Daren Mills==
'''Daren Mills''' is a hunter trainer in [[Archet]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column2: [[Bree-land Introduction]]</ref> He improved the player's skills in the [[Bree-land Introduction]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column3: [[Bree-land Introduction|Introduction]]

column1: ==Dirk Mudbrick==

'''Dirk Mudbrick''' is a member of [[Archet]]'s garrison. His original post was at Archet's West Gate but because he had to much comentare on [[Captain Brackenbrook]]'s strategy he was removed to a farm in Archet-Dale.<ref name="Spies">[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column2: [[Bree-land Introduction|Introduction]]
column3: ''Intro: The Spies''</ref> While he was defending the sheep-farms against the wolves he saw many [[Blackwolds]] passing through the dale.<ref name="Spies"/> He sent the player into the Archet-Dale to kill one of them and bring back their orders. One of these orders described the treason of [[Calder Cob]] and a planned raid against Archet.<ref name="Spies"/> He immediately sent the Blackwold-orders to Captain Brackenbrook and fought in the assault of Archet.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column5: ''Instance: The Assault on Archet''</ref> When Archet's garrison drove the Blackwolds back to Blackwold Roost he was one of those that was slain.<Ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]

column1: ==Edgar Standish==
'''Edgar Standish''' is a captain trainer in [[Archet]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column2: [[Bree-land Introduction]]</ref> He teaches the captain player how to use his class in the [[Bree-land Introduction]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column3: [[Bree-land Introduction|Introduction]]

column1: ==Fastred Burrows==
'''Fastred Burrows''' is a burglar trainer in [[Archet]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column2: [[Bree-land Introduction]]</ref> On [[Amdir (Shadows of Angmar)|Amdir]]'s request he teaches the player more about his class in the [[Bree-land Introduction]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column3: [[Bree-land Introduction|Introduction]]

column1: ==Fenton Marshly==
'''Fenton Marshly''' is one of [[Jon Brackenbrook]]'s hunters.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column2: [[Bree-land Introduction]]</ref> He started hunting as game when he was strong enough to wield a bow.<ref name="Fento">[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]
column3: ''Skimming the Surface''</ref> When the [[Blackwolds]] started to assault [[Archet]] he was stationed at the Hunter's Lodge.<ref name="Fento"/>

column1: ==Godwig the Lazy==
'''Godwig the Lazy''' is a man from [[Archet]]
column2: who can be found in Archet's Jailyard.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column3: [[Bree-land Introduction]]</ref>

column1: ==Hodor Thornberry==
'''Hodor Thornberry''' is a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] weapon-trader from [[Archet]]. He sells both one-handed as two-handed weapons.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column2: [[Bree-land Introduction]]</ref>

column1: ==Holey Sprigley==

'''Holey Sprigley''' is the wife of [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Bree-land#Cal Sprigley|Cal Sprigley]]<ref name="Reason">[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]
column2: ''Finding Reason''</ref>
column3: a farmer in the south of [[Archet]]-Dale.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column4: [[Bree-land Introduction]]</ref> When their farm was overrun they fled to Archet.<ref name="Reason"/>

column1: ==Jasper Greensmith==
'''Jasper Greensmith''' is a light armoursmith in [[Archet]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column2: [[Bree-land Introduction]]</ref>

column1: ==Kate Henseed==
'''Kate Henseed''' is a female supplier from [[Archet]]<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column2: [[Bree-land Introduction]]</ref> who informs the player that [[Amdir (Shadows of Angmar)|Amdir]] is looking for him.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column3: [[Bree-land Introduction|Introduction]]

column1: ==Mildred Catchfly==
'''Mildred Catchfly''' is the medium armoursmith in [[Archet]]. She's found west of the training fields.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column2: [[Bree-land Introduction]]</ref>

column1: ==Mindambeth==

'''Mindambeth''' is a [[Rangers of the North|Ranger]] and the quartermaster of the [[Gilminuial]]. She and [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Bree-land#Argirion|Argirion]] drowned near [[Buckland]] when the ship was drowned.<ref name="shipwrecked mariners"/>
==Nate Whisperwood==
'''Nate Whisperwood''' is a male hunter of [[Archet]]
column2: he could be found inside the Hunter's Lodge.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column3: [[Bree-land Introduction]]</ref> He fought in the assault of Archet and was slain while defending the Hunter's Lodge.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]

column1: ==Old Bloodtusk==

'''Old Bloodtusk''' was a boar in [[Archet|Archet-dale]] between [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Bree-land#Cal Sprigley|Cal Sprigley]]'s Farm and [[Blackwold's Roost]]. He lived in his den
column2: build in a rotten
column3: old tree stump.<ref name="Old Bloodtusk">[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]
column4: ''Old Bloodtusk''</ref> He always went to the walls of Cal Sprigley's Farm in search of food. On a day he went into the farm and killed one of the farmhands. Afterwards Cal Sprigley sended the player to Old Bloodtusk's Den to kill him.<ref name="Old Bloodtusk"/>

column1: ==Otto the Brigand==
'''Otto the Brigand''' was leader of the [[Blackwolds|brigands]] that attacked [[Archet]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column2: [[Bree-land Introduction|Introduction]]
column3: ''Intro: Captain Brackenbrook''</ref> He was imprisoned by [[Calder Cob]] but was freed in the Assault of Archet where he takes Amdir as prisoner to their hideout.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column5: ''Instance: The Assault of Archet''</ref>  When the player and [[Aragorn]] assault the Blackwolds in Ost Baranor he's turned into a wraith by [[Skorgrím Dourhand]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]
column6: [[Stirrings in the Darkness|Book 1: Stirrings in the Darkness]]

column1: ==Peg Pruner==
'''Peg Pruner''' is [[Archet]]'s provisioner<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column2: [[Bree-land Introduction]]</ref> and [[Captain Brackenbrook]]'s quartermaster.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]
column3: ''Fresh Suplies''</ref> She is [[Ned Pruner]] wife.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]

column1: ==Sergeant Redroot==
'''Sergeant Redroot''' is a member of [[Captain Brackenbrook]]'s garrison. He was originally posted at [[Archet]]'s gate<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column2: [[Bree-land Introduction]]</ref> but was removed to the road between Archet and [[Combe]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]
column3: [[Prologue (Shadows of Angmar)|Prologue]]</ref>

column1: ==Teal Saddler==
'''Teal Saddler''' is a guardian trainer who can be found west of [[Archet]]'s training grounds.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column2: [[Bree-land Introduction]]</ref> She improves the player's skills in the [[Bree-land Introduction]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column3: [[Bree-land Introduction|Introduction]]

column1: ==Tolman Gardner==
'''Tolman Gardner''' is a minstrel trainer in [[Archet]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column2: [[Bree-land Introduction]]</ref> During the [[Bree-land Introduction]] he teaches the player how to use his class.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column3: [[Bree-land Introduction|Introduction]]

column1: ==Will Wheatley==
'''Will Wheatley''' is [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Bree-land#Cal Sprigley|Cal Sprigley]]'s farmhand
column2: and can be found at Cal Sprigley's farm in southern [[Archet]]-Dale.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]
column3: [[Bree-land Introduction]]</ref> He fought in the assault of Archet and was slain by [[Blackwolds]] near [[Blackwold's Roost]].<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]
